He's firing at my character Thrash, who's not quite getting the hint that
5-6 bots on 1 is hardly good odds...course to Thrash those odds just add
flavor to the fight :)

Jon

----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 27, 2000 9:58 PM
Subject: Alliance VS Maximals


> Jason, who were your chars firing at? Oblitertron is no longer there, he
> split back up into the seperate bots.
>
> ::The Oblitercons/DevilDuer/Zardus::
>
> DevilDuer puts up his hands to block his face from the shots, stumbling
> backwards and tripping over a rock. He sits up, getting to his feet and
> swearing.
>
> "Zardus, we might need a bitta help here," he says into his comm as he
fires
> his stun gun again at Astral, not sure of how long he could go on
fighting.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Dark One looks at Squizzy, frowning. "You need a CR chamber. Follow me, I
> need to get back to the battle."
>
> One of the blast panels slides back into the cealing, Dark One setting off
at
> a walk, not giving any more information.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Breakdown growls as a shot hits him in the side, his three guns swirling
> around to open fire on Starlight.
>
> Several sparks jump from his wound, hitting the ground and sizzling on the
> foliage.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Pyro jumps back as he sees Griplash, getting a slash on his chest as he
> avoids most of the attack.
>
> The slash burns, Pyro pulling out his own sword and slashing it at the
> Lavacon.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Hiss swirls in time for a few shots to graze him in the side, firing back
at
> the bot that had fired on him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scavanger grunts as shots pummel him, transforming into robot mode and
> stumbling a bit before raising his gun, mech fuid leaking out of his chest
as
> he opens fire on the big Lavacon.
>
>
>
>
